column4: here in 9.04 my sound works, but in 9.10 does not, can i copy sound configs to 9.10?
here in 9.04 my sound works, but in 9.10 does not, can i copy sound configs to 9.10?
It's not that simple. What soundcard do you have?
Have you check the Sound Preference if any of the output is muted, and check alsamixer if any of the output is muted?
What laptop brand and model are you using?
What your output of lspci | grep audio
let me come with 9.10, it's 9.04 livecd
it just go the next line
Then it probably means your soundcard is not recognised in Ubuntu. Hmm, If you go to Hardware Drivers, are there any drivers for your device?
Search around in the forum or in Google then, sorry couldn't be of much help.
